title: That little voice in your head..
body:
That says "i can kill riven"...  yea i forgot you're not supposed to listen tot it..



i just thought because I'm Azir on max soldier range and she is 1 AA away from death and on the run that i can kill her...

 but of course she somehow dashes the full length of Azir's MAX range with a 5x her current hp shield, before i can even try to turn and run and stuns me and kills me. she dashes from MAX range, i cant stress enough that Azirs MAX range is a vast distance. she didn't even have ult.

i know for next time, NEVER listen to the voice...

replies.body: So you put you telegraphed the zone you wished to control, max range, and the riven used a mobility skill to avoid the zone. I don't see a problem, that's how the matchup works.

the problem i have is that before i can even react she (on 1 hp) closes that distance and takes me down from at least half hp.(she was at the very far end of the soldier too, she had to cross through the zone to even start this little journey,)

You already reacted, you put your soldiers in a position to attack her. Azir is a zone control mage, once a target is outside the zone his damage is very low.

It wouldn't have mattered if you could react. Her stun counters your dash and she can chase past your flash. The only option is to use the wall, which I'm assuming you didn't have up because if you did then it is completely your fault for not mushing her face with it.

I listened to my voice tho.
Got me my first pentakill!

ily {{champion:222}}  <3 <3
